description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFDS and 7 CFSD by March 28th, 2024.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Brake Spares

## Introduction

The Department of National Defence has issued a tender notice for the procurement of brake spares. The tender closing date is January 16, 2024, and the expected contract start date is March 29, 2024.

## Items Required

The Department is seeking the following items:

| Item # | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Valve, Pneumatic Brake | 7 | Each | 25 CFDS, Montreal |
| 2 | Valve, Pneumatic Brake | 3 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| 3 | Brake Shoe, Type | 234 | Each | 25 CFDS, Montreal |
| 4 | Brake Shoe, Type | 116 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| 5 | Cable Assembly, Hand | 80 | Each | 25 CFDS, Montreal |
| 6 | Cable Assembly, Hand | 40 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| 7 | Regulator, Compressed Gas | 13 | Each | 25 CFDS, Montreal |
| 8 | Regulator, Compressed Gas | 7 | Each | 7 CFSD, Edmonton |
| ... | ... | ... | ... | ... |

For a comprehensive list of required items, please refer to the tender documents.

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: W8486-249444/A
* Reference Number: cb-599-16332308
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: November 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 16, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: June 28, 2024

## Tendering Procedure

The tendering procedure is competitive and open to all eligible suppliers. The Crown retain the right to negotiate with suppliers.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this tender are as follows:

* Lowest Price

## Documents

All documents required for this tender are available on the Canada Buy Service website. Suppliers may also request a copy of the Design Data List (DDL), drawings, and specifications by contacting the Contracting Authority.

## Submission

Submissions must be made electronically to the following email address: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. Tender
